thread.title: BRIEF-Brazil's Usiminas to restart blast furnace in Ipatinga- filing | Reuters

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Brazil's Usiminas to restart blast furnace in Ipatinga- filing | Reuters

organizations.name: usinas siderurgicas de minas gerais sa usiminas

text:
April 17 (Reuters) - Usinas Siderurgicas de Minas Gerais SA Usiminas:
* BRAZILIAN STEELMAKER USIMINAS TO RESTART BLAST FURNACE IN IPATINGA, SHUT DOWN SINCE 2015 - FILING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting by Tatiana Bautzer)
